versions.versionNotes: Initial version - Parses work experience into structured format

schema.prompt:
Parse the following work experience information into a structured format for resume generation:

Raw Experience Data: {{input.experienceText}}
Target Role (if provided): {{input.targetRole}}
Key Skills to Highlight: {{input.keySkills}}

Extract and structure:
1. Company name and dates
2. Job title/role
3. Key responsibilities (action verb format)
4. Quantifiable achievements (with metrics)
5. Technologies/tools used
6. Skills demonstrated

Focus on:
- Using strong action verbs (led, developed, increased, managed, etc.)
- Quantifying results where possible (percentages, dollar amounts, time saved)
- Highlighting relevant experience for the target role
- Removing redundancy and filler words

Return as structured JSON with keys: company, dates, title, responsibilities (array), achievements (array), technologies (array), skills (array).

props.placeholder: Paste or describe your work experience, duties, and achievements...
What position are you applying for? (optional)

translations.description: Parses raw work experience into structured resume format with action verbs and quantified achievements
translations.instructions: Enter your work experience details. The system will structure it into professional resume format with strong action verbs and quantifiable results.
translations.name: Experience Parser
